name: Hibiscus Wrap Around Halter Dress, Printed Cotton Summer Dress w A-line Knee Length Skirt, Gathered
description:
This halter dress has been handmade from a stunning floral cotton print. Includes a wrap around button back, and adjustable neck tie. A-line shaped skirt.

inspired by many things, but mainly a mix of my famous wrap around halter top and a love of gorgeous prints. Part of the Red Flora Collection!

Being 100% cotton (including the lining), it is perfect for those hot summer days, but can be quite dressy, so great for a wedding or party!

Features included in the Hibiscus Halter Dress:

- made from a 100% cotton with a polished/slight sateen texture. The print is of large hibiscus flowers, in colours of peach, red, orange, purple, yellow, brown, green on a white background.

- the lining is a 100% cotton, in pale peach colour.

- fitted around the bust and the waist is defined by using elastic and buttons at the back.

-The halter top is fastened by a tie around your neck.

- gathered at the neck. This is a great addition to the dress as it suits women with a smaller bust as well as a medium sized bust

- fully lined with all seams hidden inside the two layers.

- a wrap around back. One layer overlaps the other layer, and each back piece is curved at the hem, creating curved tulip shape.

-Perfect for travelling; versatile, light weight, and minimum creasing.

To discuss sizing, please use the contact page. This is available in Australian sizes 4 to 10, and is best suited to someone with a small to medium sized bust.

Care Instructions:
Gentle Machine Wash in Cold Water, Line Dry. Do Not Tumble Dry, Do Not Soak.

name: Magenta Pink Cross-Over "Gerbera Petal" Jersey Knit Top, w Printed Cotton Cap Sleeve and Tie
description:
The Magenta Pink Gerbera Petal X-over Top has been handmade from a viscose/elastane jersey knit in pink/purple magenta, and a contrasting cotton print for the tie and short sleeves.

Versatile: wear it with jeans for day, and a fitted pencil skirt for night.

Perfect for travelling, the office, and the weekend.

-handmade from a viscose/elastane knit, in a pinky-purple, and a 100% cotton, printed in gorgeous bright colours of magenta, red, green, blue, aqua, lime, gray, cream.

- short cap sleeve and tie around waist in print.

- a wrap- around style. The tie fastens around your waist, so you can tie it as loose or as tight as you like.

-all seams are over-locked and trimmed neatly

-only 15 copies will be made

- designed and handmade in Sydney, Australia.

Measurements: please convo me to discuss measurements and sizing!

Care Instructions:

Hand cold wash separately. Dry in shade. Do not tumble dry. Warm Iron.

name: Pink, Navy & White Stripe "Marie Bow Top" Knit Jersey T-shirt, w Navy Large Bow
description:
The Pink Marie Bow Top has been handmade from two viscose/elastane jersey knits: a pink, navy and white stripe, and navy for the stunning large bow at front, collar and cuffs.

Versatile: wear it with jeans for day, and a fitted pencil skirt for night.

A nautical, fun, and feminine twist to your wardrobe!

The bow is exaggerated, and over the top- how it should be! Features in The Pink Marie Bow Knit Top include:

-handmade from a viscose/elastane knit, in pink, navy and white stripe, and a white viscose/elastane knit for the trim and large bow.

-sleeve cuff, V-neck collar, and large bow are all done in navy

-all seams are over-locked and trimmed neatly

-only 10 copies will be made

Measurements: please convo me to discuss measurements and sizing!

Care Instructions:

Hand cold wash separately. Dry in shade. Do not tumble dry. Warm Iron.

name: Bright Blue Peacock Knit Jersey Top w Black Lace & Boat Neck
description:
Handmade from a very soft bright blue rayon/elastane jersey knit, and includes a stunning black lace which has been appliqued to the shoulder.

This top is a more casual Penelope Red style, but the lace means you can dress this style up or down. Looks great tucked into a high waisted pair of pants or a skirt.

Features of the Bright Blue Peacock Top include:

-Made from rayon elastane jersey knit fabric in a brilliant bright blue colour. The rayon (viscose) makes it very comfortable and soft, the elastane helps it to hold its shape and stretch over the body.

-boat neckline

-3/4 length sleeves

- lace appliqued onto shoulder

-hem falls to hip

-Perfect for travelling. Very little creasing, lightweight, versatile, and very comfortable.

-Perfect for work, casual or to a party.

I have made this in Australian sizes 8 to 14 (or US sizes 4 to 10). Please contact me if you have any questions and to double check the sizing.

Care instructions:
Cold machine wash on a GENTLE cycle, inside out, separately. Do not bleach, do not tumble dry. Line Dry. Iron on a cool setting, with a cloth covering.

name: Paris Cowl Neck Top in Navy Blue and Bright Red Jersey
description:
Handmade from two contrasting jersey knit fabrics; a dark navy blue for the body, and a bright red for the draped cowl neck and cuffs.

The Penelope Red Paris Cowl Neck Top looks perfect with jeans or a pair of black pants. I could even imagine this with one of my fluted skirts too! Great for spring and summer! It is worn in these photos with the new Hathor Olive Pants, and a pair of Penelope Red jeans!

Features of the Paris Cowl Neck Top include:

- a fitted body and short sleeve in navy blue rayon/elastane jersey knit fabric- to help create a slim silhouette!

- a collar and short sleeve cuff in bright red.

- the front neck is a V with a cowl neck. The cowl neck has a generous amount of drape.

- handmade from a lovely soft rayon (viscose) elastane- a knit fabric, so it has a beautiful soft feel to it, but also holds it's shape really well.

Measurements: please contact me to discuss measurements and sizing!

Care Instructions:

Gentle machine wash. Dry in shade. Do not tumble dry. Warm Iron.
